mapper.select: SELECT A.DATASEQ, A.FACTORYID, (SELECT FACTORYNAME FROM DSP_FACTORY B WHERE B.FACTORYID = A.FACTORYID) AS FACTORYNAME, CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT (DATE, A.WORK_DATE), 120) AS WORK_DATE, A.LINEID, (SELECT LOCATIONNAME FROM DSP_LOCATION WHERE LOCATIONTYPE = 'LINE' AND LOCATIONID IN (A.LINEID) AND FACTORYID IN (A.FACTORYID)) AS LINENAME, A.SHIFTID, A.MATERIALID, A.MODELID, A.PLAN_QTY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DSP_WORKER_INPUT C WHERE C.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND C.ISUSABLE ='Usable') AS DSP_WORKER_INPUT, (SELECT SUM(MANHOUR) FROM DSP_WORKER_MANHOUR D WHERE D.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND D.ISUSABLE ='Usable') AS MANHOUR, (SELECT SUM(PROD_QTY) FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS E WHERE E.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND E.ISUSABLE ='Usable') AS PROD_QTY, (SELECT SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY) FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS E WHERE E.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND E.ISUSABLE ='Usable') AS FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY, (SELECT SUM(FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS E WHERE E.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND E.ISUSABLE ='Usable') AS FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY, (SELECT CONVERT (VARCHAR, DATEADD (s, ( SELECT SUM(G.NOTOPERATE_TIME) FROM( SELECT F.WORKDAILY_SEQ, DATEDIFF(SECOND, (SUBSTRING(F.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,1,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(F.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,3,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(F.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,5,2)) , (SUBSTRING(F.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,1,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(F.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,3,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(F.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,5,2))) AS NOTOPERATE_TIME FROM DSP_NOTOPERATE_CONTENTS F WHERE F.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND F.ISUSABLE ='Usable' ) G WHERE G.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ ), '' ), 8) ) AS NOTOPERATE_TIME FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.FACTORYID = #{plant} AND A.ISUSABLE ='Usable' AND A.LINEID = (SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION WHERE FACTORYID = #{plant} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC ) ORDER BY DATASEQ
